general_advisory: Due to forecast of very light to light rainfall, postpone application of fertilizer & chemicals. High humidity may lead to insect pest survey in kharif crops.

advisory: Incidence of BLB and Blast disease, spray Copper Oxychloride and Plantomycin or Tebuconazole + Trifloxystrobin or Soil application of MOP recommended.
To manage Pod borer, spray Emamectin Benzoate, Chlorantraniliprole, or Profenophos.
Chances of Bacterial Leaf Blight, manage with Streptomycin and copper oxy chloride.
When crop is 85% mature, go for harvesting and sun drying for 2-3 days.
Chances of Aphids infestation, manage with Imidachloprid spray.
Early sown crop at maturity stage, harvest and sun dry for 2-3 days.
Intercultivation and apply Urea and MOP per acre.
To control Fruit and shoot borer in Brinjal, spray Neem based pesticide.
Chances of infestation of Downy Mildew disease in cucurbits, manage with Copper Hydroxide spray.
